name: Nightly Inverted Icons for all Firefox 4+
description: This Style will allow all Firefox 4+ users to benefit from the Inverted Icons introduced and used in the Nightly 8 and up versions, without having to run one of those builds to get them.
additional_info:
This style was inspired by style 51603 by user 15980. I just took it a step further and added the icons, so that everyone could use it.
Pros: Increases icon visibility on dark themes, regardless of whether the icons are set to large or small. 
Cons: Only a partial set. (for now anyway)
